This post will take a look at the box score in Visualization form.  The goal of this post is to quickly view who scored and assisted on goals from the game.

Buffalo Sabres: 3 (Win)

Once again, the top line strikes, with both Jack Eichel and Sam Reinhart provding to assists on the night and Jeff Skinner scoring another goal.
```{r sabres, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
sabres <- read_csv("~/bdown/data/sabres_ducks.csv", skip = 1) %>%
  slice(1:(n()-1)) %>%
  separate(Player, c("First", "Last", "id"), extra = "drop") %>% 
  unite("Player", c("First", "Last")) %>%
  select(Player, G, A, PTS) %>% 
  #filter(PTS > 0) %>%
  gather("Category", "Stat", "G":"PTS") %>%
  ggplot(aes(Player, Stat)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "steelblue") +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~ Category) +
  theme(panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_blank()) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,5,1))
  
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(sabres)
```
